main event: A blinking light was observed at Ramey AFB, Puerto Rico, on September 15, 1960, which varied in color from blue-white to dully red and appeared to be under intelligent control.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5-10 minutes., The radar indicated an unidentified object at the location., Witnesses included both military and civilian personnel., The object was described as descending and ascending rapidly., It was concluded that the object was likely a satellite or unidentified aircraft.
